name: Simply Organic Whole Bay Leaf, 0.14 Ounce Glass Jar, Kosher, Sweet, Earthy Aroma, No ETO, Non GMO
short_description: Bay Leaf - This premium organic bay leaf offers a subtle, earthy aroma that infuses your dishes with a unique, savory flavor, perfect for slow-cooked meals.
Bay Leaf - This premium organic bay leaf offers a subtle, earthy aroma that infuses your dishes with a unique, savory flavor, perfect for slow-cooked meals.
Best uses - Perfect for adding depth to soups, stews, braised meats, and sauces, this aromatic bay leaf enhances your favorite savory dishes with its distinctive herbal essence.
Grown for something greater - Simply Organic works directly with sourcing partners whenever possible, paying fair prices directly to them, without a middleman, to maximize the grower's return.
Organic Bottled Spices - Elevate your dishes with Simply Organic Bottled Spices, where the pure, delicious flavor of our spices and seasonings bring the goodness of organics to everyday meals.
About us - We are Simply Organic. The original, all-organic spice brand that lives up to the promise of our name in all we cultivate and bring to the table.
product_description: Simply Organic Bay Leaf (Laurus nobilis) is the only botanical the FDA recognizes as bay and approves for consumption as a spice. An inferior herb — Umbellularia californica, also known as “California bay” — is sometimes sold as bay. It’s longer, darker leaves make it seem more appealing than true bay, but “California bay” has a harsher, more camphor-like flavor. And, one of its key constituents, umbellulone, can induce headaches. That’s just not cool. We authenticate every shipment of our bay to make sure you’re getting real Laurus nobilis, the only bay suitable for culinary use. Best Uses: Don’t stop at soup and seafood. Infuse its earthy, grounding flavor into your beans, grain dishes, and pasta sauce. Or even a simple pot of rice. Features: - 0.14 oz glass bottle - Hand-select high quality whole dried bay leaf; non-irradiated - USDA organic certified and kosher certified - Botanical name: Laurus nobilis

name: Apsogo Organic Greek Thyme – Premium Dried Thyme Leaves from Greece (3.52 oz) Aromatic for Cooking, Tea & Seasoning, 3.52 oz Resealable Eco Pouch
short_description: Authentic Greek Thyme Harvested in the Mountains – Collected from high-altitude Greek terrain known for producing exceptionally fragrant greek thyme with unmatched purity and intensity.
Certified Organic Thyme of Exceptional Quality – Grown on a certified organic farm, this organic thyme is cultivated naturally and harvested at peak freshness for maximum aroma and flavor.
Premium Dried Thyme With High Essential Oil Content – Carefully dried to preserve its essential oils, this dried thyme offers a clean, bold, herbaceous character that stands out in every dish.
Versatile Thyme Leaves for Everyday Cooking – Use these vibrant thyme leaves in roasted meats, poultry, vegetables, soups, stews, marinades, and Mediterranean recipes for elevated flavor.
Smooth, Easy-to-Blend Thyme Seasoning – The fine texture of this thyme seasoning mixes effortlessly into rubs, sauces, spice blends, and dressings without clumping.
Naturally Perfect for Herbal Thyme Tea – Brew a calming, aromatic thyme tea using hot water and a spoonful of this premium Greek thyme for a soothing herbal infusion rich in natural compounds.
Ideal for Marinades, Meats & Mediterranean Dishes – Combine with olive oil, lemon, and garlic for classic Mediterranean marinades, or sprinkle directly into grilled, baked, and slow-cooked dishes.
Enhances Soups, Breads & Homemade Seasoning Mixes – This aromatic dried thyme brings warm, savory notes to homemade bread, stock, stuffing, pasta sauces, and chicken dishes.
Packaged for Freshness in an Eco-Friendly Pouch – The resealable, environmentally friendly pouch keeps your thyme leaves aromatic and potent while using renewable materials.
Produced by Passionate Greek Artisans – Apsogo collaborates with small, artisanal farmers dedicated to crafting exceptional organic thyme using traditional, sustainable Greek farming practices.

name: McCormick Culinary Thyme Leaves, 6 oz - One 6 Ounce Container of Dried Thyme Leaves, Perfect for Soups, Meat and Seafood Entrees
short_description: PERFECT SUBSTITUE FOR FRESH THYME: McCormick Culinary Thyme Leaves deliver a distinctive taste and aroma with earthy notes of lemon and mint
SAVES TIME AND LABOR: Made especially for chefs; these premium dried thyme leaves will be a flavorful and versatile addition to the kitchen without the stress of picking fresh leaves
SOURCED FOR CHEFS: Contains 6 ounces of thyme seasoning, so you can add flavor to all your signature dishes
VERSATILE HERB: Pairs well with various vegetables, seafood, meats and marinades
FEEL GOOD FLAVOR: Inspire new menus with an herb that delivers consistent, pure flavor; kosher with no added MSG
product_description: Product Description Commercial chefs understand the importance of herbs like thyme in their kitchens. Dried thyme leaves will deliver a subtle taste and fragrance in your signature dishes. Designed especially with chefs in mind, this McCormick Culinary product is one of the most popular herbs to have on hand in the kitchen. Thyme is a common ingredient in many foods. It is often present in Middle Eastern and French spice blends because it infuses your cuisine with a warm, minty flavor. Whether you're preparing some vegetables or a meat rub, this seasoning will enhance every dish. Achieving a fresh, balanced taste is paramount. This product contains dried thyme leaves sourced from France, Spain and Morocco because the thyme plant flourishes in these sunny climates. Leaves from healthy plants produce the most flavor and best performance. Plus, harvesting these leaves at their peak and testing each batch ensures the highest-quality dried thyme, which adds visual interest wherever you sprinkle it. Each 6-ounce container of dried thyme leaves delivers versatility and flavor ideal for use in commercial kitchens. These herbs add a dash of flavor to meat, poultry and seafood entrees. You can also use thyme in soups, stews and sides ranging from mashed potatoes to roasted vegetables. With its taste and texture, thyme seasoning also works well as a meat rub. You can blend it with complementary herbs like sage, rosemary and oregano. Experiment in the kitchen and create your own uniquely flavored custom rubs for new menu items. You can also use thyme to create a range of irresistible sauces, marinades and dressings that will quickly become customer favorites. McCormick Culinary Thyme Leaves will deliver consistent, pure flavor you can feel good about serving to your guests. Dried thyme leaves are kosher and made without added MSG, making it easy to inspire special menus that your guests will love.
